DOC.detailed_description: Depakote use treat seizure child 20 year . The purpose study determine effectiveness divalproex sodium ( Depakote ) treat child temper outburst severe mood disorder . This study last 12 week . Participants randomly assign receive either 250 mg Depakote placebo . The dose medication increase end Week 1 500 mg either depakote placebo ; participant remain dose Week 5 . At Week 6 , participant cross-over receive treatment ( either depakote placebo ) , take Week 12 . Study visit occur weekly include physical exam , blood urine test , self-reports adverse event . In addition , caregiver complete report mood swing throughout study .
